text: The Lublin trolleybus is a trolleybus network serving Lublin metropolitan area in Poland. It is one of the three Polish cities that currently have such a network, along with Gdynia and Tychy. ==Main lines== {| border="1" width="100%" class="wikitable sortable" ! scope="col"| Line ! scope="col" class="unsortable"| Map ! scope="col" class="unsortable"| Route ! scope="col"| Stops ! scope="col"| Time |- |align="center"| 150 |100px | Osiedle Poręba – Granitowa – Jana Pawła II – Al.
